name: Peter Cowling
content: Prof Peter Cowling - School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science Skip to main content School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science School of Electronic Engineering and Computer SciencePeopleProfiles Professor Peter CowlingProfessor of Artificial IntelligenceEmail: p.cowling@qmul.ac.ukRoom Number: Peter Landin, CS 415TeachingResearchTeachingResearch Impact and Engagement (Postgraduate) This module equips IGGI PhD students with the knowledge and skills required to understand how they can responsibly generate economic, social and cultural impact from their research. An intensive part 1 introduces students to a range of topics in the context of interaction between academic research and the games industry: user engagement, communication skills, responsible innovation, and inclusive and ethical research. In part 2, students are then mentored (possibly remotely) by industry and academic experts to design and develop a more substantial piece over several weeks -- a game, interactive experience, short film or similar -- that communicates their research to wider audiences.ResearchResearch Interests:See Peter Cowlingâ€™s research profile pages including details of research interests, publications, and live grants.
